files.description: Implements the single QA runner (python -m qa.run) with documented CLI flags, stable output locations, subprocess orchestration, and non-zero exit codes on failure.
Provides canonical path resolution utilities for stable output directories and consistent artifact locations across environments.

missionDescription: Create/standardize the single runner command (e.g., scripts/qa_run.sh or python -m qa.run) with documented flags, stable output locations, and non-zero exit codes on failure; make all workflows call this runner.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker
